column2: BRIEF-Universal Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.44 Excluding Items May 23 (Reuters) - Universal Corp: * Q4 REVENUE $607.5 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Universal Corp Announces Enhanced Capital Allocation Strategy And 36 Pct Dividend Increase May 23 (Reuters) - Universal Corp: * UNIVERSAL CORPORATION ANNOUNCES ENHANCED CAPITAL ALLOCATION STRATEGY AND 36% DIVIDEND INCREASE * UNIVERSAL CORP - DECLARED INCREASE IN ITS QUARTERLY DIVIDEND TO SEVENTY-FIVE CENTS PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
